lockedAvailable.caption: These are the funds after deducting all the locked funds, that can be send.

lockedInPendingInputs.title: @:common.balance.lockedInPendingInputs
lockedInPendingInputs.caption: These funds are being used in a pending transaction.

lockedInPendingCollateral.title: @:common.balance.lockedInPendingCollateral
lockedInPendingCollateral.caption: Collateral funds being used in a pending transaction.

lockedUtxos.title: @:common.balance.lockedUtxos
lockedUtxos.caption: Locked funds, not to be spent by $t(common:appName) or dapps - Manually select utxos to be unlocked on page: Account > UTxO List.

lockedByTokens.title: @:common.balance.lockedByTokens
lockedByTokens.caption: Within Cardano, any token/nft has some ADA attached, the locked by tokens amount tells you (estimate) how much this is for your current wallet.
lockedByTokens.linklabel: Read more about minimum ada value requirement

lockedByTokensTF.title: @:common.balance.lockedByTokensTF
lockedByTokensTF.caption: Organizing all of your UTxOs using Token Fragmentation would bind this much ADA.

lockedByCollateral.title: @:common.balance.lockedByCollateral
lockedByCollateral.caption: Locked funds, to be used as collateral by $t('common:appName')- Disable collateral in the account settings to be able to spend these funds.
lockedByCollateral.linklabel: Read more about the collateral mechanism

lockedAsRewards.title: @:common.balance.lockedAsRewards
lockedAsRewards.caption: Rewards are not spendable in dapps and must be withdrawn first. $t('common:appName')can do this automatically, go to: Account > Wallet Settings > Auto Withdrawal, and enable it.
lockedAsRewards.linklabel: Read more about the rewards mechanism

lockedFees.title: @:common.balance.lockedFees
lockedFees.caption: Submitting transactions to the Cardano blockchain costs transaction fees.

total.label: Stake breakdown
total.hover: Total staked on this wallets stake key.

notstaked.label: @.capitalize:common.label.notStaked
notstaked.hover: ADA not staked, placed on enterprise addresses.

controlled.label: @.capitalize:common.label.controlledStake
controlled.hover: ADA staked to the stake key of this account (either owned, external or in smart contracts).

external.label: Staked externally
external.hover: ADA from this account combined with any external staking keys.
